ygData.subject: Re: Newbie Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... no there is nothing you can do.  mostly because this is an emote and not a real action.  did you bother to check your equipment/cash to verify whether or
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:50 PM 10/22/1999 -0400, you wrote:
>From: James W Hooper <jhooper@...>
>4. Is there anyway to prevent a PC thief from picking your pockets? ( He
>was a PC, because I wasn't allowed to attack him, even though he was my
>current target.) I see this as having a negative effect on my character.
>If they can effect my character in a negative way, why can't I do the same
>to them? A quick kick or throw would end that problem. I have a hard
>time believing that some Shadowknight or Necro is going to stand there
>while some little sneak thief makes off with their hard earned money or
>items. It wouldn't have been so bad if they hadn't taunted me about it and
>then run off.


no there is nothing you can do. mostly because this is an emote and
not a real action. did you bother to check your equipment/cash to
verify whether or not he had taken what he said he took?
